verses.verse: Then the heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> came near <S%H5066><s%> to Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> and to the heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

They spoke <S%H1696><s%> to them at Shiloh <S%H7887><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> to <S%H3027><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> us cities <S%H5892><s%> to dwell in, <S%H3427><s%> with their suburbs <S%H4054><s%> for our livestock. <S%H929><s%>"

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> out of their inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> according to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> these cities <S%H5892><s%> with their suburbs. <S%H4054><s%>

The lot <S%H1486><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> for the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites. <S%H6956><s%> The children <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> who were of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> had thirteen <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the Simeonites, <S%H8099><s%> and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Benjamin. <S%H1144><s%>

The rest <S%H3498><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> had ten <S%H6235><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> out of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> and out of the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1648><s%> had thirteen <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> out of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Asher, <S%H836><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> and out of the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> in Bashan. <S%H1316><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%> had twelve <S%H8147><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Zebulun. <S%H2074><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> these cities <S%H5892><s%> with their suburbs <S%H4054><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> to the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

They gave <S%H5414><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> these cities <S%H5892><s%> which are mentioned <S%H7121><s%> by name: <S%H8034><s%>

and they were for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites, <S%H6956><s%> who were of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Levi; <S%H3878><s%> for theirs was the first <S%H7223><s%> lot. <S%H1486><s%>

They gave <S%H5414><s%> them Kiriath <S%H7151><s%> Arba, <S%H704><s%> named after the father <S%H1><s%> of Anak <S%H6061><s%> (the same is Hebron <S%H2275><s%>), in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%> around it. <S%H5439><s%>

But they gave <S%H5414><s%> the fields <S%H7704><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> and its villages <S%H2691><s%> to Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> for his possession. <S%H272><s%>

To the children <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> they gave <S%H5414><s%> Hebron <S%H2275><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> for the manslayer, <S%H7523><s%> Libnah <S%H3841><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
Jattir <S%H3492><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> Eshtemoa <S%H851><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
Holon <S%H2473><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> Debir <S%H1688><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>

Ain <S%H5871><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> Juttah <S%H3194><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Beth Shemesh <S%H1053><s%> with its suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> nine <S%H8672><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> out of those two <S%H8147><s%> tribes. <S%H7626><s%>
Out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> Geba <S%H1387><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
Anathoth <S%H6068><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Almon <S%H5960><s%> with its suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>
All the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> were thirteen <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their suburbs. <S%H4054><s%>

The families <S%H4940><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath, <S%H6955><s%> the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> even the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath, <S%H6955><s%> had the cities <S%H5892><s%> of their lot <S%H1486><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Ephraim. <S%H669><s%>

They gave <S%H5414><s%> them Shechem <S%H7927><s%> with its suburbs <S%H4054><s%> in the hill country <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> for the manslayer, <S%H7523><s%> and Gezer <S%H1507><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
Kibzaim <S%H6911><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Beth Horon <S%H1032><s%> with its suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>
Out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> Elteke <S%H514><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> Gibbethon <S%H1405><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
Aijalon <S%H357><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> Gath Rimmon <S%H1667><s%> with its suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

Out of the <S%H4276><s%> half-tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> Taanach <S%H8590><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Gath Rimmon <S%H1667><s%> with its suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>
All the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> were ten <S%H6235><s%> with their suburbs. <S%H4054><s%>

They gave to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon, <S%H1648><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> out of the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> Golan <S%H1474><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> for the manslayer, <S%H7523><s%> and Be Eshterah <S%H1203><s%> with its suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>
Out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> Kishion <S%H7191><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> Daberath <S%H1705><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
Jarmuth <S%H3412><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> En Gannim <S%H5873><s%> with its suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>
Out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Asher, <S%H836><s%> Mishal <S%H4861><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> Abdon <S%H5658><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
Helkath <S%H2520><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Rehob <S%H7340><s%> with its suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

Out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> Kedesh <S%H6943><s%> in Galilee <S%H1551><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> for the manslayer, <S%H7523><s%> Hammothdor <S%H2576><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Kartan <S%H7178><s%> with its suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>
All the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the Gershonites <S%H1649><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%> were thirteen <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their suburbs. <S%H4054><s%>

To the families <S%H4940><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Merari, <S%H4847><s%> the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> Jokneam <S%H3362><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> Kartah <S%H7177><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
Dimnah <S%H1829><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Nahalal <S%H5096><s%> with its suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>
Out of the tribe of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> Bezer <S%H1221><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H3096><s%> Jahaz with its suburbs,
Kedemoth <S%H6932><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4158><s%> and Mephaath with its suburbs; <S%H702><s%> four cities. <S%H5892><s%>

Out of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> Ramoth <S%H7433><s%> in Gilead <S%H1568><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> for the manslayer, <S%H7523><s%> and Mahanaim <S%H4266><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> with its suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> Jazer <S%H3270><s%> with its suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities in all. <S%H5892><s%>

All these were the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> even the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Levites. <S%H3881><s%> Their lot <S%H1486><s%> was twelve <S%H8147><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

All the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> in the midst <S%H272><s%> of the possession <S%H272><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were forty <S%H705><s%> - eight <S%H8083><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their suburbs. <S%H4054><s%>
Each <S%H5892><s%> of these cities <S%H5892><s%> included their suburbs <S%H4054><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> them. <S%H5892><s%> It was this way with all these cities.

So Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to Israel <S%H3478><s%> all the land <S%H776><s%> which he swore <S%H7650><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> to their fathers. <S%H1><s%> They possessed <S%H3423><s%> it, <S%H3427><s%> and lived in it.

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> gave them rest <S%H5117><s%> all around, <S%H5439><s%> according to all that he swore <S%H7650><s%> to their fathers. <S%H1><s%> Not a man <S%H376><s%> of all their enemies <S%H341><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them. <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh delivered <S%H5414><s%> all their enemies <S%H341><s%> into their hand. <S%H3027><s%>

Nothing failed <S%H5307><s%> of any <S%H1697><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> All came to pass. <S%H935><s%>
